sentence: could i have flight information on flights from pittsburgh to phoenix please
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v0.flight_id||'"', '"'||v0.flight_days||'"',
 v0.departure_time, v0.arrival_time, '"'||v0.airline_flight||'"',
 '"'||v0.airline_code||'"', v0.flight_number, '"'||v0.aircraft_code_sequence||'"',
 '"'||v0.meal_code||'"', v0.stops,
 v0.connections, '"'||v0.dual_carrier||'"', v0.time_elapsed,
 '"'||v1.airport_code||'"', '"'||v2.city_code||'"', '"'||v2.city_name||'"',
 '"'||v3.airport_code||'"', '"'||v4.city_code||'"',
 '"'||v4.city_name||'"' FROM flight v0, airport_service v1,
 city v2, airport_service v3, city v4 
WHERE (((v0.from_airport = ANY v1.airport_code) 
AND ((v1.city_code = ANY v2.city_code) 
AND (v2.city_name = 'PITTSBURGH'))) AND ((v0.to_airport = ANY v3.airport_code) 
AND ((v3.city_code = ANY v4.city_code) 
AND (v4.city_name = 'PHOENIX'))));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT FLIGHT.FLIGHT_ID , FLIGHT.FLIGHT_DAYS , FLIGHT.FROM_AIRPORT , FLIGHT.TO_AIRPORT , FLIGHT.DEPARTURE_TIME , FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME , FLIGHT.AIRLINE_FLIGHT , FLIGHT.AIRLINE_CODE , FLIGHT.FLIGHT_NUMBER , FLIGHT.AIRCRAFT_CODE_SEQUENCE , FLIGHT.MEAL_CODE , FLIGHT.STOPS , FLIGHT.CONNECTIONS , FLIGHT.DUAL_CARRIER , FLIGHT.TIME_ELAPSED FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' PITTSBURGH ' ) ) AND FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' PHOENIX ' ) ) ) ) ;
